welcome_message_body: Welcome to Paterson, a charming city known for its rich history and beautiful waterfalls. We're so glad you're here and we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Dunkin'
restaurants.description: Dunkin' is a donut shop located in Paterson.

restaurants.name: Mr. G's Diner
restaurants.description: Mr. G's Diner is a diner located in Paterson.

restaurants.name: Taşkın Bakery
restaurants.description: Taşkın Bakery is a bakery located in Paterson.

restaurants.name: Toros Restaurant
restaurants.description: Toros Restaurant is a mediterranean restaurant located in Paterson.

restaurants.name: Al Basha
restaurants.description: Al Basha is a middle eastern restaurant located in Paterson.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipal Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free of charge.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Handles domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Handles mainly domestic flights for United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Handles mainly domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at LaGuardia Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The newest terminal at LaGuardia Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The terminal at LaGuardia Airport dedicated to Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: The terminal at LaGuardia Airport dedicated to American Airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the Wi-Fi network for free for 30 minutes, or purchase a longer access pass.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport caters to high-end travelers and their private jets.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest terminal at JFK, serving international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serves international and domestic flights for Delta Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The newest and most modern terminal at JFK, serving international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Serves domestic flights for JetBlue Airways.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: Serves international flights for British Airways, Cathay Pacific, and other airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines.

wifi.note: Limited free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, with the option to purchase high-speed access.
